General.Name: Clientele
General.Description: Clientèle Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides financial products and services in South Africa. It operates in four segments: Long-Term Insurance; Short-Term Insurance; CBC Rewards, Clientèle Mobile & Direct Rewards; and Other. The company underwrites, markets, and distributes insurance and investment products. It also offers funeral, hospital, legal, and life insurance products; and provides estate preservation, wealth, investment, and credit life cover plans, as well as financial advisory services. In addition, the company offers short-term insurance products, such as personal and business lines legal insurance policies. Further, it provides rewards benefits to its clients from a range of retailers and service providers; and airtime and data to the CBC Rewards clients. The company is headquartered in Morningside, South Africa. Clientèle Limited is a subsidiary of Friedshelf 1577 Proprietary Limited.
General.Address: ClientEle Office Park, Morningside, South Africa, 2196
